entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Break apart <UseSingleProject> and enable more defaults via `<UseMaui>` #4619
  • Clearing BindableProperty causes styles properties to disappear #4617
  • IVisualTreeElement.GetVisualParent returns null for elements in Border #4614
  • VisualTreeElementExtensions.GetVisualTreeElements does not work for transformed elements #4613
  • Hot Reload not refresh the UI if apply changes related with sizing (Padding, Margin, etc) #4611
  • [Android] Crash updating FontSize using HotReload #4610
  • Grid RowDefinition Heigth Binding not working #4609
  • A CarouselPage so that we can swipe between different Pages without using templates. #4606
  • In shell App, PresentationMode.Modal does not hide NavigationBar for Top level Page #4603

Closed

  • dotnet workload install maui-android failing #3091
  • [Bug] Unable to install workloads #3087
  • [Bug] tvos and macos are missing after installation of Visual Studio 2022 Preview 4 #2586
  • [Bug] .NET 6.0 RC 1 MAUI workloads update failed. #2499
  • [Bug] Debug for Windows App Fails Deployment: Need recipe file #2493
  • [Bug] The IDE has some errors after using the template to create the MAUI project #2490
  • Lots of build Error when Creating MAUI Blazor App using VS2022 File New Project Template #2168
  • [Bug] - Error installing maui workload - NU3004: Package signature validation failed #2025
  • [Bug] Missing framework Microsoft.Maui.Extensions #1982
  • Existing android SDK/adb/openJDK install not recognized #1821
  • [Bug] I'm getting the `NETSDK1139: The target platform identifier maccatalyst was not recognized.` error #1795
  • Install/Upgrade scenario with new host builder pattern #2630
  • [Bug] HttpClient crashes on Android #1260
  • [Bug] .NET MAUI Blazor App crashed on physical device #3060
  • Blazor with maui can not use <InputSelect> or <select> #4325

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Provisionator channel as a parameter on the pipeline #4620
  • [iOS, Catalyst] Shell View Handler #4616
    area/shell 🐢
  • Essentials.Compass refactored to interface and singleton #4615
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Clipboard refactored to interface and singleton #4612
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [X] Identify Setter property target in VSG case #4607
  • Essentials.Browser refactored to interface and singleton #4605
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Barometer refactored to interface and singleton #4604
    area/essentials 🍞

Merged

  • Make sure to use the correct p/invoke for 32-bit #4600
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • [ci] Add agent cleaner to device tests #4618
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4602
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [ci] Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) support #4547
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Implement WebView navigation events #4443
    area/controls 🎮
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • [ci] Allow to build agains internal sdks #4591
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • CarouselView android handler #3343
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] CarouselViewHandler #4200
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Add Shell to default template #4524
    area/templates 📄
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Core] Implement SizeChanged event #4541
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • Add handling and tests for TextTransform for SearchBar/Editor/Entry #4554
    area/controls 🎮
  • Initial work to get unpackaged WinUI apps #4460
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮
  • Essentials.AppActions refactored to interface and singleton #4596
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Core] Implement IsReadOnly property in SearchBar #3391
    area/controls 🎮
  • GraphicsView Touches - Alternate API #4342
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Remove Material Visual marker #4428
  • Refactored Preferences into an Interface #4582
  • Implement touch events in GraphicsView #3261
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/drawing ✏️
  • Allow to use string to define StrokeShape in XAML #3256
    area/Xaml </>, area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS] Update DatePickerHandler and TimePickerHandler #3761
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Add pending Picker events and notify items collection changes #4346
    area/controls 🎮
  • Renaming public APIs Native --> Platform #4599
  • Shapes Handlers #4472
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows] Implement Border properties in RadioButtonHandler #4416
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • Implement Cookies property in WebView #4419
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Implement IsFocused property and Focus(), Unfocus() methods #4588
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/a11y
  • Moved IPlatformServices.GetNamedSize into a separate service #4570
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.300-preview.14
